name: In Deep Sheet
description:
In Deep Sheet

The third game I've made and first completed game jam submission!

In Deep Sheet is a top-down, analysis, flick-shooter where you play as a sniper watching over your contact who is inside of an apartment housing criminals.

You must use your skills to correctly identify your contact and take out the rest of the criminals. Go too fast and you may hit your contact, so aim true and keep practicing to beat your time!

I wanted to do a little experiment this time around to try and get myself more comfortable with my drawing skills. I'm not a good artist whatsoever but I figured I could make something unique to myself if I drew all the sprites by hand. So I did, and it turned out about as janky as one would expect. However, I'll take it as it was a learning experience nonetheless.

Additionally, this was my first time recording sound effects myself, however I would like to note that the background ambient audio was not made by me and instead I found it online.
